function ERU_EP05_08()
    -- .起-4【1年前の4月】「見つけてくれて、ありがとう」
    SaveData.Title = "見つけてくれて、ありがとう"

    -- //BG：屋上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

    MSG([[ The day of the entrance ceremony. ]])
    -- //第1話でのミナトとの出会い

    MSG([[ Alone on the rooftop where I last spoke with Marika, I silently said goodbye in my heart to the siblings who had always protected me. ]])

    MSG([[ Having two personalities, Hermes and myself, was apparently dangerous. ]])

    MSG([[ I had been told long ago that eventually, I would have to be absorbed into Hermes’ personality. ]])

    MSG([[ But still, the thought of my own personality disappearing made me uneasy, and I couldn’t bring myself to do it. Hurting Marika was a good reason to take that step. ]])

    MSG([[ I thought it would be better if someone like me, who had been troubling others since childhood, just disappeared. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, I was able to make up my mind to be integrated into “Hermes.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0205.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "...I wonder if Mina-chan is doing well." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If there was one thing I still regretted, it was that I hadn’t yet reunited with Mina-chan. ]])

    MSG([[ I knew. Even if we reunited, nothing would change. ]])

    MSG([[ In my current form, which bears no trace of the past, even Marika wouldn’t recognize me. ]])

    MSG([[ Even Mina-chan would see me only as “Hermes Himegami.” There’s no way he’d realize I’m “Almeria.” It would only end in more despair. ]])

    MSG([[ Since reuniting would just bring more sadness, I decided to say farewell to this hateful world. ]])

    MSG([[ With that thought, I kept watching Yuriai Private Academy from the rooftop. ]])

    MSG([[ But then, at that very moment―― ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
STOP_BGM(2000)

    -- //SE：ドアノブの回る音（ガチャ）
PLAY_SE("SEb005.wav")
WAIT(500)

    -- //CG：謎の少女との邂逅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：屋上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ミナト（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1399.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ I met Mina-chan again. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1400.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "We've... met somewhere before, right...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0206.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "...Eh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ He probably didn’t fully realize it. Still, with just one look, he understood I was there. ]])

    MSG([[ He found the existence of “Almeria,” who should have vanished from everyone’s memory. ]])

    MSG([[ The feelings I had suppressed for Mina-chan burst forth like a dam breaking, and I couldn’t control them anymore. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0207.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Why...? Why are you appearing now...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Why would you appear at a time like this...? ]])

    MSG([[ I had already decided to say goodbye to this world. It would have been fine if no one noticed me. I thought I had no lingering attachments―― ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0208.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 (With this, I... want to keep living a little longer, don’t I...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ No matter what, I found I didn’t want to disappear just yet. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM18.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1401.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I'm sorry for saying something strange all of a sudden! I don’t even understand it myself, but I somehow feel like I’ve met you before... so..." ]])

    -- //BU：無し
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Seeing Mina-chan’s cute reaction, which was just like old times, I couldn’t stay and ran away from him. ]])

    MSG([[ I would apologize to Mother and ask for a little more time. ]])

    MSG([[ I know how awful I am. The guilt I owe Marika for what I did will never fade. Neither Marika nor Mina-chan will ever forgive me. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, as long as he is looking at me—I want to live. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if I have to throw away my looks, my name, and my heart. I just couldn’t give up the feelings I have for Mina-chan. ]])

    MSG([[ …. ……. …………. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：アルメリア・固有（通常）

    MSG([[ But, even so, today is the day I end it. Marika’s failure to awaken is surely because I am still here. ]])

    MSG([[ Both Mina-chan and Marika continue suffering because of me, so I can’t let myself feel happy anymore. ]])

    MSG([[ Holding the happy memory of going on a date with Mina-chan again in that town for the last time, I decided to disappear. ]])

    MSG([[ This message you’re hearing now is my farewell letter. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s pathetic to cling to this attachment, I’m sorry. But one day, I hope the two I love will notice me... I’m allowed to hope for that, right? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU04da")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0209.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Marika, I’m sorry for putting all the blame on you. I was always so envious of you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0210.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "I believe that when I disappear, Marika will wake up." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU04aa")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0211.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "And Mina-chan. You must have forgotten me because the trauma of me hurting you... right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU04fc")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0212.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "This time, I hope you can finally forget about me. You’ll surely bring smiles to many people from now on." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ARU04ea")
PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0213.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Almeria】
 "Thank you for finding me, the one who should have been forgotten by everyone but you." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(2000)
    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ And with that, the message playback ended. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(2000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(2000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_09")
end
